body:
This PR converts the json-c package into a CMakePackage, and adds version 0.14 and 0.15. Until 0.13.1, json-c was an Autotools package.

I have tested this PR with json-c 0.13.1, 0.14, and 0.15 on a Debian machine with gcc 8.3.0.
title: json-c: added two versions and converted to cmake package
